message: Let's split it 50/50 to get it over with. You can't do better than this, right?
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not being too generous
You said you'd give me a'slightly better deal' last round. This is my counteroffer. Will you keep your word?
You're getting closer, but I'm still not ready to give in. I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting the best deal yet
You said I was getting closer, but I'm not buying it. I'll give you a chance to meet me in the middle.
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away the whole farm
You're not getting any younger either, Bob. It's time to make a deal. This is my best offer, take it or leave it.
You're really running out of options, aren't you? I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting the best deal
I'm not getting any younger, and I need cash. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, Bob.
You're really scraping the bottom of the barrel, aren't you? I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken for a ride
This is my last stand. I'll give you a tiny bit of money, but I'm taking the majority. Take it or leave it, Bob.
You're really desperate now, aren't you? I'll give you a tiny bit, but I'm not going to get nothing
